title: RBI Meeting Live Updates: Few minutes to go for Guv Shaktikanta Das's speech
selftext:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is likely to maintain the status quo on the benchmark interest rate at its bi-monthly monetary policy review to be announced on October 6, in view of elevated inflation and global factors, suggests CNBC-TV18's Citizens MPC poll.   
Governor Shaktikanta Das will begin his speech at 10 am.   
Track LIVE updates hereðŸ‘‡
